item.title: Let's start at the very beginning
item.description:
class: title-slide, center, middle
Let’s start at the very beginning A very good place to start Jen Richmond · R-Ladies Sydney INSERT SLIDES LINK HERE .pull-left[ The Plan Why R? Navigating RStudio Getting your data in Cleaning it up a little Maybe….probably not… summary stats/plotting
You will need a laptop and access to wifi, but we will use RStudio Cloud, so don’t worry about installation.
